__TOC__

Use this section to draft your tutorial. 

To add a tutorial draft, create a child of this page by typing the address in your browser.
For example: you want to draft a tutorial about creating a gif in gimp, then type: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuStudio/Tutorials/CreateGifInGimp in your browser and click on "Create new empty page". It will automatically appear in the list bellow.

Once you are done, consider adding it to the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UbuntuStudio|User Wiki]]</nowiki>
